channel.title: Maxing lvl help
channel.description: Hello, how do i edit the max level for admins? like atk is 200 or something around that line :)

item.title: Maxing lvl help
item.dc:creator: @Patchumz Patchumz
item.description:
@Patchumz wrote:

Search for this [code]public int getLevelForXP(int exp) {
int points = 0;
int output = 0;

	for (int lvl = 1; lvl <= 135; lvl++) {
		points += Math.floor((double)lvl + 300 * Math.pow(2.0, (double)lvl / 7.0));
		output = (int)Math.floor(points / 4);
		if (output >= exp) {
			return lvl;
		}
	}
	return 135;
}[/code] and replace it with this

[code]public int getLevelForXP(int exp) {
int points = 0;
int output = 0;

	for (int lvl = 1; lvl <= 200; lvl++) {
		points += Math.floor((double)lvl + 300 * Math.pow(2.0, (double)lvl / 7.0));
		output = (int)Math.floor(points / 4);
		if (output >= exp) {
			return lvl;
		}
	}
	return 200;
}[/code]

Read full topic
